quotes.text: Data is the new oil.
quotes.author: Clive Humby

quotes.text: Without big data, you are blind and deaf and in the middle of a freeway.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Moore

quotes.text: War is ninety percent information.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: In God we trust, all others bring data
quotes.author: The Internet

quotes.text: Data is the new competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Gary Kasparov

quotes.text: Knowledge is power, information is liberating.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: Data doesn't lie. But statistics can be misleading.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Information is the oil of the 21st century, and analytics is the combustion engine.
quotes.author: Peter Sondergaard

quotes.text: The future of business is insight from data.
quotes.author: Hal Varian

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Data science is a blend of statistics, programming skills, domain expertise, and a healthy dose of skepticism.
quotes.author: Cathy O'Neil

quotes.text: No data is clean, but most is useful.
quotes.author: Dean Abbott

quotes.text: The greatest value of a picture is when it forces us to notice what we never expected to see.
quotes.author: John W. Tukey

quotes.text: It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data.
quotes.author: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who know how to learn and unlearn.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.text: In the age of information, the only sustainable advantage is knowledge.
quotes.author: John Naisbitt

quotes.text: Data is like garbage. You’d better know what you are going to do with it before you collect it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: There were 5 exabytes of information created between the dawn of civilization through 2003, but that much information is now created every two days.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.text: We are surrounded by data, but starved for insights.
quotes.author: Jay Baer

quotes.text: With data collection, ‘the sooner the better’ is always the best answer.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.text: Errors using inadequate data are much less than those using no data at all.
quotes.author: Charles Babbage

quotes.text: Data analytics is the future, and the future is NOW! Every mouse click, keyboard button press, swipe or tap is used to shape business decisions. Everything is about data these days. Data is information, and information is power.
quotes.author: Radi, data analyst at CENTOGENE
